channel.title: Need ::noclip command[PI]
channel.description: hey guys i need the ::noclip command if u can give exact instructions that would be great. Thanks, Nick :cool:

item.title: Need ::noclip command[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Open your client folder.
Open your class Client.java.
Search for:

if(inputString.equals("::dataoff"))

It should say:

						if(inputString.equals("::dataoff"))
							clientData = false;
						}
					}
				}

Right under ‘clientData = false;’, add:

					if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) {
						for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) {
							for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) {
								for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
									aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;
							}

Make sure there are 4 ending brackets at the end or you’ll probably get 100 errors.

Read full topic
